channel.title: 317 Client And Server Help Needed
channel.description: I have a server source called dragon-history x or something. and it download client but there was an error with run.bat so i copy run.bat from another client and removed the one in dragon client and pasted this. it's worked and i was able to play . but when your in log in screen. they ask for username and password. just those two. how do i add server ip and port to that menu. when ever people logging in. they are logging in ip 127.0.0.1? or something and their port is random like 50215,50218,47154. how do i fix it! or where do i fix it? server file or client file. client .java or .class?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 07:11:18 am[/size][hr]will some1 please post

item.title: 317 Client And Server Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @Chiizu Chiizu
item.description:
@Chiizu wrote:

ok… i beleave what your trying to fix is the port number and find out the ip to log in on??? Correct me if i’m rong but…

ipchicken.com for your ip address (U can leave your ip blank when logging in on your own server btw)

and to edit the port on the client open up server.java and search for the the port its logging u in on and just change it… after that recompile! might i suggest the regularly used 43594

if your trying to edit the port on he server insted just open server.cfg and change the port it says their Problem solved…

if i knew what u ment and hopefully i did

Read full topic
